title: The Flower Arrangement Experience
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>This flower.... would look good around here, I think? Wawaah, the flower is falling over~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Let’s get some help from the flower with a thick stem next to it. If you let them intertwine with one another.... There, it stood up beautifully<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oooh, you’re right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You have a good eye for 3D space and color schemes, huh, Kanan-san. I think you have a talent for flower arrangement<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh, really? I didn’t realize at all.... I just did it to what I thought looks nice and didn’t really think about it, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I think the fact that you did it naturally means it’s a good fit for you, Kanan-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I-, is that so? If you say that, then I guess I’m a little bit happy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Umm, today is just a trial for experiencing flower arrangement, if you have an interest in it, then....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Aaaah, I can’t! My feet are at their limit! I’m sorry, Shioriko-chan. I don’t think I have the talent for sitting up straight~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufufu, I think that’s a matter of getting used to it instead of a knack. This position helps with the numbness of both feet. There<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
